Details: Cannot lose weapon. Choose subclass, which grants different effect when you Swap.
The first time each turn that you spend AP, you may spend essence up to AP spent to regain 1 AP per essence.

After you make a skill check, you may make a difficulty 15 Presence (Charm) skill check to convince them to guide you. On a success, you may treat your result as if youâ€™d rolled a 15. After you fail the Presence (Charm) skill check to use this ability you cannot use it again until you complete a rest.
Increase one Attribute of your choice by 1.
At the end of each of your turns, you may gain the benefits of the Shift action.
You have advantage on all Insight skill checks.
Increase one Attribute of your choice by 1.
You have advantage on skill checks made as part of your Skill Memory class feature.
Increase one Attribute of your choice by 1.
Attacks of opportunity against you do not have advantage.
